title: League wont open
body: When I click the league launcher the icon pops up in the middle of my monitor and than dissappears

replies.body: When the patcher tries to launch, it needs permissions from your OS otherwise access will be blocked.  Your settings need to be adjusted to allow the patcher to launch.  I suggest going through our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
